description.original: This is a Quran Lookup plugin for Obsidian. This replaces chapter:verse shorthand with verse text in arabic and translation.
description.translation: This is a Quran Lookup plugin for Obsidian. This replaces chapter:verse shorthand with verse text in arabic and translation.

dict..setDesc(\"If true, provides translation: .setDesc("If true, provides translation under the Arabic verse")
dict..setDesc(\"If true, removes the added tr: .setDesc("If true, removes the added translator content that would normally appear in parenthesis")
dict..setDesc(\"Wraps the Arabic verse in HTM: .setDesc("Wraps the Arabic verse in HTML Span CSS, backticks, or None")
dict..setDesc(\"Select the font family for th: .setDesc("Select the font family for the Quran text.")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the font size for the Qur: .setDesc("Set the font size for the Quran text.")
dict..setDesc(\"Which container to use for di: .setDesc("Which container to use for displaying the verses")
